name: [The Title is the Last Word of the Story]
name_original: [The Title is the Last Word of the Story]
description:
[The Title is the Last Word of the Story] is a piece about transness and finding a support structure, even in strange places.

Content Warnings:

  • Suicidal Ideation and Implications; no explicit imagery
  • Sexual Mentions
  • Transphobic slurs
  • May be unsettling for plural readers

(Cover art by Kaiizree)
